question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. projector
B. man in yellow
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The projector is mounted on the ceiling and appears in the upper center of the image, while the man in yellow is seated further back in the room; their relative 3D positions require depth perception to accurately judge which is closer to the camera.
